subtitle: the growth of a team and a sport, 1870 to 1900
title: The New York Giants base ball club
subjects: New York Giants (Baseball team) -- History -- 19th century

description.value: ""Excellent"--Nine; "wonderful"--SABR Bibliography Committee Newsletter. No team better exemplified baseball in the 19th century than the New York Giants. They were one of the league's premier teams simply because they played in the country's premier city. New York and its Giants epitomized the rise of industrialized America and the need for organized spectator diversions"--Provided by publisher.
